title: iti samupAgata
sahitya:
iti samupAgata nirvEdOyam ganga dvAramavAptaha sahasa


anupallavi

  tatra dEvasadanE vilAsan dEvam mAdhavam acintayAdiha hrdi tarasA


caraNam 1    tadanu vilOkyAsau tAnava dUtAn shurEva vandE vinatEna shirasA
    caraNam 2    shOSitan hOmaya kardamarAshih shrI padmanAbha padAmbuja rajasA
